programme.title: Armageddon Can Wait
programme.short_synopsis: After a turbulent few years, Alistair Cooke likens the yearly events to biblical stories.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke contemplates what he considers to be; 'the striking resemblance of the events of the past year or so to the chronicles of the Bible'.

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
